guest.name: Laura Schaffer
guest.title: Head of Growth at Amplitude
guest.background: Laura Schaffer is the Head of Growth at Amplitude, previously serving as VP of Product and Growth at Rapid and spending over seven years at Twilio leading growth and experimentation platforms. She is an expert in PLG (Product-Led Growth), developer marketing, and building experimentation cultures.
guest.background_zh: Laura Schaffer 现任 Amplitude 增长负责人，曾任 Rapid 产品与增长副总裁，并在 Twilio 工作超过七年，负责增长与实验平台。她是 PLG（产品驱动增长）、开发者营销以及建立实验文化领域的专家。

episodeSummary: Laura Schaffer shares her journey from sales to product leadership, emphasizing how to carve your own career path by leveraging customer insights. She dives deep into counter-intuitive growth tactics, such as why adding friction can improve conversion, how to sell to developers who hate sales, and why growth teams should prioritize experiment velocity over statistical perfection.
episodeSummary_zh: Laura Schaffer 分享了她从销售转型为产品领袖的职业历程，强调了如何通过利用客户洞察来开辟自己的职业道路。她深入探讨了反直觉的增长策略，包括为什么增加摩擦力反而能提升转化率，如何向厌恶销售的开发者推销产品，以及为什么增长团队应优先考虑实验速度而非统计学的完美精确度。
